  "title": "Junior Front-End Developer",
  "description": "Elizabeth Maddeux provides a range of human resources solutions designed to empower your workforce, enhance technical proficiency, refine soft skills, and accelerateorganizational growth for better impacts by enhancing organizational dynamics through a well-rounded and robust human resource intervention.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Junior Front-End Developer
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos (Remote, Project-Based)
Employment Type: Contract
Duration: 6 months

Key Responsibilities


	Develop and maintain responsive web interfaces using Remix (React Router), TypeScript, and modern front-end practices.
	Build responsive UIs using Tailwind CSS.
	Integrate and consume REST APIs to deliver seamless user experiences.
	Work with Google Maps API and other third-party services where needed.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams (designers, backend engineers, product managers) to bring product features to life.
	Ensure applications are optimized for performance, scalability, and accessibility.
	Maintain clean, version-controlled codebases using Git/GitHub.
	Write reusable, maintainable, and testable code following best practices.


Requirements


	Strong proficiency in TypeScript, JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, and CSS3.
	Hands-on experience with Remix Js and the React ecosystem.
	Proficiency in Tailwind CSS for building modern, responsive layouts.
	Familiarity with REST APIs, Git, and collaborative workflows (pull requests, code reviews).
	Experience integrating APIs such as Google Maps API.
	Solid understanding of responsive design, cross-browser compatibility, and UI/UX best practices.
	Basic knowledge of state management (React Query, Zustard, and Context API).
	Familiarity with CI/CD workflows and deployment tools is a plus.
	Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and ability to work independently.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Portfolio to:&nbsp;executivesearch@elizabethmaddeux.com&nbsp;using &ldquo;Front-End Developer&rdquo; as the subject of the email.",

        Elizabeth Maddeux provides a range of human resources solutions designed to empower your workforce, enhance technical proficiency, refine soft skills, and accelerateorganizational growth for better impacts by enhancing organizational dynamics through a well-rounded and robust human resource intervention.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Junior Front-End Developer
Job Location: Lagos (Remote, Project-Based)
Employment Type: Contract
Duration: 6 months

Key Responsibilities

	Work with Google Maps API and other third-party services where needed.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams (designers, backend engineers, product managers) to bring product features to life.
